description: This API is used to retrieve optional override properties for the tables that need to be replicated. These properties can include properties for filtering and partition for source and target tables.

parameters.name: ResourceArn
parameters.description: The connection ARN of the source, or the database ARN of the target.

parameters.name: TableName
parameters.description: The name of the table to be replicated.

nested_items.name: ResourceArn
nested_items.description: The connection ARN of the source, or the database ARN of the target.

nested_items.name: TableName
nested_items.description: The name of the table to be replicated.

nested_items.name: SourceTableConfig
nested_items.description: A structure for the source table configuration.

nested_items.name: Fields
nested_items.description: A list of fields used for column-level filtering.

nested_items.name: FilterPredicate
nested_items.description: A condition clause used for row-level filtering.

nested_items.name: TargetTableConfig
nested_items.description: A structure for the target table configuration.

nested_items.name: UnnestSpec
nested_items.description: Specifies how nested objects are flattened to top-level elements. Valid values are: 'TOPLEVEL', 'FULL', or 'NOUNNEST'.

nested_items.name: PartitionSpec
nested_items.description: Determines the file layout on the target.

nested_items.name: FieldName
nested_items.description: The field name used to partition data on the target.

nested_items.name: FunctionSpec
nested_items.description: Specifies a function used to partition data on the target.

nested_items.name: TargetTableName
nested_items.description: The optional name of a target table.
